type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Attack Target Condition

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/attack_target_condition).

Applies a bi-entity condition check with an entity as the actor and the attack target of that entity as the target.

Type ID: `apugli:attack_target_condition`



---

bientity_condition.description: The bi-entity condition to test for with the entity as the actor and its attack target as the target.
